PHRASE.LANG: 無線控制器 DUALSHOCK®3 Lightning Edition
無線控制器 DUALSHOCK®3 Lightning Edition
The wireless controller for the PS3™ system provides intuitive gameplay experience with its SIXAXIS motion sensor and vibration feature. This is the Asia limited FINAL FANTASY XIII Lightning Edition.
누구나 쉽게 직감적인 조작이 가능한 6축 시스템(SIXAXIS)과 진동기능을 탑재한 PS3™전용 무선 컨트롤러. 아시아 한정, FINAL FANTASY XIII Lightning Edition입니다.
The wireless controller for the PS3™ system provides intuitive gameplay experience with its SIXAXIS motion sensor and vibration feature. This is the Asia limited FINAL FANTASY XIII Lightning Edition.
搭載可進行自然體感操作的六軸檢測系統和震動機能的PS3™專用無線控制器。這是亞洲限定的FINAL FANTASY XIII Lightning Edition。
搭載可進行自然體感操作的六軸檢測系統和震動機能的PS3™專用無線控制器。這是亞洲限定的FINAL FANTASY XIII Lightning Edition。
